text: Donna Troy is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. She was created by Bob Haney and Bruno Premiani, first appearing in The Brave and the Bold #60 (1965). == Fictional character biography == The character is an Amazon super-hero who began her career as the second Wonder Girl, but has also used several other names including Troia, Darkstar, Wonder Woman and Deathbringer. She was married to Terry Long, with whom she had a child named Robert; she also had a relationship with Kyle Rayner. She is a founding member of the Teen Titans, and has also been involved with the Challengers from Beyond, Darkstars and Justice League of America. == In other media == Donna has appeared in many cartoon television shows and movies. She made her live adaptation debut in the DC Universe and HBO Max series Titans, played by Conor Leslie in the first, second, and third seasons. Category:DC Comics superheroes Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1965
title: Donna Troy
